resources.string: Wild Ginger Dinnery Delivery Tablet App
An image of a dinner at Wild Ginger

Wild Ginger is the ultimate Asian dinner restaurant. We have chefs from China, Japan, Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand. Thus, we have dishes from each of these countries. If you are looking for top tier pho, our Vietnamese chef will gladly make it for you. If you are looking for some pad see ew, our Thai chef will serve it right up!
